statements: SELECT * FROM security_footage;
SELECT footage_id, camera_id, timestamp FROM security_footage WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM security_footage WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT footage_id, camera_id FROM security_footage WHERE footage_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT footage_id, timestamp FROM security_footage WHERE camera_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND timestamp < '2022-03-01 12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM security_footage;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM security_footage WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM security_footage GROUP BY camera_id;
SELECT footage_id, timestamp FROM security_footage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM security_footage;
SELECT * FROM footage;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM footage WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_url FROM footage WHERE camera_id = 'c7cf46f5-8b12-44d4-ae1c-73615c4fb4eb';
SELECT location, model FROM camera WHERE resolution = '4K';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, video_url FROM footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM footage WHERE camera_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT camera_id, timestamp FROM footage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, model FROM camera WHERE resolution = '4K';
SELECT * FROM footage f JOIN camera c ON f.camera_id = c.camera_id;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, video_url FROM footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM security_cameras WHERE status='active';
SELECT DISTINCT resolution FROM footage_archive;
SELECT footage_id, timestamp FROM footage_archive ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT playback_id, playback_duration FROM playback_history WHERE playback_duration > 10;
SELECT * FROM security_cameras WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT camera_id, location FROM security_cameras WHERE resolution = '1080p' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM footage_archive WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT footage_id, timestamp FROM footage_archive WHERE resolution = '4k' AND footage_id IN (SELECT footage_id FROM playback_history);
SELECT playback_id, playback_timestamp FROM playback_history ORDER BY playback_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM Camera;
SELECT camera_id, camera_location FROM Camera ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Footage WHERE time_recorded > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY time_recorded ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM SurveillanceEvent WHERE event_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT playback_id, playback_time, playback_user FROM PlaybackHistory WHERE playback_user = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Camera;
SELECT camera_id, camera_location FROM Camera ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_time FROM SurveillanceEvent WHERE event_type = 'Motion Detected';
SELECT playback_user, playback_time FROM PlaybackHistory WHERE playback_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY playback_time ASC;
SELECT f.*, c.camera_location FROM Footage f INNER JOIN Camera c ON f.camera_id = c.camera_id;
SELECT * FROM cameras;
SELECT location, type FROM cameras WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT camera_id, resolution FROM cameras WHERE type = 'PTZ' ORDER BY camera_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM footage WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT event_type, description FROM events WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM cameras WHERE type = 'indoor';
SELECT location, resolution FROM cameras WHERE camera_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM footage WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT camera_id, COUNT(footage_id) AS footage_count FROM footage GROUP BY camera_id ORDER BY footage_count DESC;
SELECT e.*, u.name FROM events e JOIN users u ON e.camera_id = u.user_id WHERE event_type = 'intrusion';
